caption: This clip features a melody played by violins and flutes. This is a low quality recording. There is no percussion in this song. Hand claps are played on every count. This is a folk song which has a happy mood. There is no voice in this song. This song can be used in a movie scene where somebody enters a castle to meet medieval royalty.
